title: Christ Is Here

tokens.lyric: Christ is here, Christ is here!
I sought him in ashes, down long, narrow streets,

lines.raw: [Am]I sought him in ashes, down long, narrow streets,

tokens.lyric: But searching in sorrow, I found him in joy,

lines.raw: [C]But searching in sorrow, I found him in joy,

tokens.lyric: How many have fasted and prayed for this hour, But we have the blessing.

lines.raw: [Am]How many have fasted and prayed for this hour, But we have the blessing.

tokens.lyric: Of serving the Father through loving His son.

lines.raw: [D]Of serving the Father through loving His son.

tokens.lyric: Lord, we are not worthy, we are not complete, And yet we are chosen.

lines.raw: [Am]Lord, we are not worthy, we are not complete, And yet we are chosen.

tokens.lyric: How gladly I'll give Him my heart, hands and voice.

lines.raw: [D]How gladly I'll give Him my heart, hands and voice.
